com.gamelanlabs.chimplecrowd.demos

Class CompareSamplers

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gamelanlabs.chimplecrowd.demos.CompareSamplers

  • public class CompareSamplers
extends java.lang.Object
    Demo that visualizes the prior and posterior distributions produced by the random coin generative model, using various solvers.
    Author:
    BenL
